name: Farming Simulator 22: Case IH Farmall Anniversary Pack
summary: Celebrating the 100th Anniversary of Farmall, you get two iconic Farmall tractors by CaseIH, authentically digitized: The classic six-cylinder Case IH Farmall 1066 Hydro and the modern multi-talent Case IH Farmall 120C - both continuing the enduring Farmall legacy in Farming Simulator 22.
